Content: In Space Race, you will equip your spaceship with supplies to use on your journey and discover new planets while racing around the galaxy. Race to each checkpoint in the game to earn points and upgrade your ship. With thousands of planets to explore, Space Race is always exciting!

:ibox:• Two race modes: timed and player vs. player
• Online or offline play
• Thousands of different planets to explore
• Ability to choose and customize your ship
• Variety of plant and animal life waiting to be discovered
In addition, Space Race contains five mini games for even more fun and points:

:ibox:• The Workshop: Use supplies you have gathered to craft upgrades to your ship.
• Match It: Match pictures of the planets.

• Mixed-Up Messages: Decode scrambled messages for clues to help you reach the next checkpoint.
• Maze Escape: Find your way out of the maze and get valuable supplies and points.
